title: Cannot Sync Calendar
description: Customer reports that their calendar events are not syncing across devices.

title: App Freezes on Startup
description: Customer says the mobile app freezes immediately after launching on iOS 15.

title: Unable to Update Payment Method
description: Customer cannot update their credit card information in the billing section.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer did not receive the confirmation email after placing an order.

title: Profile Picture Not Uploading
description: Customer is unable to upload a new profile picture; the upload button does nothing.

title: App Crashes During Video Playback
description: Customer reports that the app crashes whenever they try to play videos.

title: Cannot Redeem Promo Code
description: Customer’s promo code is invalid even though it is active and not expired.

title: Slow App Performance
description: Customer reports the app is extremely slow on Android 12 devices.

title: Refund Received Partially
description: Customer received only half of the refund amount they were promised.

title: Cannot Change Password
description: Password change fails with an unknown error message.

title: Duplicate Notifications
description: Customer receives multiple notifications for the same event.

title: Cannot Export Data
description: Customer cannot export their report as CSV or PDF; export fails every time.

title: App Notification Sound Not Working
description: Customer reports that notification sounds are not playing on iPhone 14.

title: Cannot Apply Discount
description: Customer cannot apply discount on checkout, even though it’s valid.

title: Order Status Not Updating
description: Customer’s order status remains ‘Processing’ even after shipping.
